item.title: Brace Yourselves
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:22, topic:439043”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=541745.msg3968909#msg3968909 date=1333990060]

wats dat never seen kk ima go post my 600+ pi in rsc sections now bi

tbh I doubt 70% of the people here knew this was here lol
[size=2pt]and did you also know that 94.538626247928% of statistics are made up?!
Don’t worry though, this one is apart of that trustworthy 5.461373752072 percent!![/size]

I’m an expert in this field, your calculations are off by .003 percent.

Quite Plausible!

For the people who advertise on the forums and don’t know, there should be something where they are notified/warned/or told to advertise on the serverstatus page before making their post, maybe to newcomers, 10 posts or under, or 50, or something
[/quote]
As they’re writing a new topic, a little message box above the post gives them a bunch of information like
“If you’re trying to advertise, use our advertisment page!
If you need help, try [url to search]searching!
If you have any problems with VPS, try out VPS THREAD!”[/quote]
Kind of like for the moderation system (I’d know about that good enough) when on moderated status, everytime you click the post button, a notification box appears and says “Your post will not appear until approved by a moderator”

Read full topic

item.title: Brace Yourselves
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

ofc it does

en.wikipedia.org

65,535

65535 is the integer after 65534 and before 65536. 65535 is the product of the first four Fermat primes: 65535 = (2 + 1)(4 + 1)(16 + 1)(256 + 1). Because of this property, it is possible to construct with compass and straightedge a regular polygon with 65535 sides. See constructible polygon.

Vortex post made me lmfao

Read full topic
